feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [LIM1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack L122B01/L122B02/L122B03/L122B04/L122B05 maintenance notification.
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 6, 2026, 05:00 - 16:00 UTC

Nov 20, 22:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

Start time : 06/01/2026 05:00 UTC
End time : 06/01/2026 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance servers located in racks L122B01, L122B02, L122B03, L122B04 and L122B05 will experience a loss of network connectivity for 1 hour.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipments on the specified racks.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 42E17 incident notification
entry.content:
Nov 21, 19:24 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers on rack 42E17 has been resolved.

Start time : 21/11/2025 18:28 UTC
End time : 21/11/2025 19:23 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 21, 18:58 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific rack.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 21/11/2025 18:28 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the rack 42E17 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers located in the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG5][Cooling System] - Rack SBG0505B09B maintenance notification
entry.content:
Nov 21, 15:04 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 21, 08:06 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 21, 08:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 21/11/2025 07:45 UTC
End time : 21/11/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance. Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.
